Params: {1: '1', 2: '<size=50>Having bid farewell to her most precious one,</size>', 3: '-350', 4: '50', 6: '1', 7: '1', 9: '3'}
{1: '2', 2: '<size=50>Lucia steps into what will become her long imprisonment.</size>', 3: '-350', 4: '-50', 6: '1', 7: '1', 9: '3'}
{3: 'Having bid farewell to her most precious one, Lucia steps into what will become her long imprisonment.'}
{3: 'Through glimpses of "future information," she sees herself standing before the rift. Among the nine possible futures, she knows this path will lead to the fewest losses.'}
{3: 'Even still, multiple possibilities await at the end of this path.'}
{3: 'She has seen a future where, after winning the battle, she and her commandant return to the correct era with the core, reuniting with everyone.'}
{3: 'She has also seen one where she fails to hold on for these 30 years, leaving the world in complete chaos.'}
{3: 'And more often... she has seen herself returning to the Hetero Tower, repeatedly battling Vonnegut only to fall to his power.'}
{3: "Was Commandant able to regroup with Liv and Lee without Cradle's interference?"}
{3: 'These questions remain unanswered, and this anxiety is bound to haunt her for a very long time to come.'}
{3: 'Should she fail to endure these arduous 30 years, should she disappoint all those relying on her... how would she ever reconcile with herself?'}
{3: 'But what other choice is there? If no one restores this devastated past, the "present" that person could return to would cease to exist entirely.'}
{3: '...She will take it as a gamble.'}
{3: 'She and the commandant have already found the path of least sacrifice through their journey. This alone is worth being grateful for.'}
{3: 'Lucia takes out the paper four-leaf clover from her chest, gently caressing it in her palm as she prays for a miracle at the end of her long imprisonment.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: '...No matter what happens, Gray Raven will always reunite.'}
{3: 'She speaks these words to herself as she gazes at the paper clover.'}
{3: 'She needs to believe these words. She must believe that miracles are still possible.'}
{1: '1', 2: "<size=60>Meanwhile, she steels herself for what's to come.</size>", 3: '0', 6: '1', 7: '1', 9: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: '<size=60>No matter what, she must fulfill her final promise...</size>', 3: '0', 4: '70', 6: '1', 7: '1', 9: '3'}
{3: "Meanwhile, she steels herself for what's to come. No matter what, she must fulfill her final promise..."}
